alert.note: Alert for Jackson (Wisconsin) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS LaCrosse (Southwestern Wisconsin, Southeastern Minnesota, and Northeast Iowa)
info.headline: Flood Watch issued April 13 at 9:18PM CDT until April 16 at 4:00AM CDT by NWS LaCrosse
info.description: ...The National Weather Service in La Crosse WI has issued a Flood Watch for the following rivers in Wisconsin... Black River at Black River Falls affecting Jackson County. For the Black River...including Neillsville, Black River Falls, Galesville...flooding is possible. ...FLOOD WATCH IN EFFECT FROM LATE THURSDAY NIGHT TO EARLY SATURDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Flooding is possible. * WHERE...Black River at Black River Falls. * WHEN...From late Thursday night to early Saturday morning. * IMPACTS...At 47.0 feet, Some rural roads may begin to flood including county Highway VV downstream near the La Crosse County line. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 8:00 PM CDT Wednesday the stage was 42.2 feet. - Forecast...Flood stage may be reached early Friday morning. - Flood stage is 47.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: If you are in the watch area, remain alert to possible flooding. Additional river and weather information is available at www.weather.gov/lacrosse. The next statement will be issued Thursday morning.
